short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Its PaceMan but in a Pop-up you open in any tab by clicking the extension logo

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A compact version of the world renowned app "PaceMan", you can pin it to your favorite browser and literally just click it to use it. It displays all the runners on pace (like Paceman), and clicking on the live ones opens a new tab (like Paceman).
